original_text: Some Pharisees and Sadducees went to see Jesus. They wanted to test him to see what he would do. They asked him, ‘Do something powerful for us to see. Then we will believe that God has sent you.’
korean_text: 바리새인과 사두개인들이 와서 예수를 시험하여 하늘로부터 오는 표적 보이기를 청하니

sentences.original_text: Some Pharisees and Sadducees went to see Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 바리새인과 사두개인들이 예수를 만나러 왔다.

sentences.original_text: to see what he would do.
Do something powerful for us to see.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 볼 수 있도록 강력한 일을 행해보라.
